title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1415/1999 of 29 June 1999 fixing the minimum selling prices for beef put up for sale under the invitation to tender referred to in Regulation (EC) No 1221/1999
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1415/1999
of 29 June 1999
fixing the minimum selling prices for beef put up for sale under the invitation to tender referred to in Regulation (EC) No 1221/1999
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The minimum selling prices for beef for the invitation to tender held in accordance with Regulation (EC) No 1221/1999 for which the time limit for the submission of tenders was 21 June 1999 are as set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 30 June 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 148, 28.6.1968, p. 24.
(2) OJ L 210, 28.7.1998, p. 17.
(3) OJ L 148, 15.6.1999, p. 21.
(4) OJ L 251, 5.10.1979, p. 12.
(5) OJ L 248, 14.10.1995, p. 39.
